'''Fragrant Chicken-Mushroom Skewer''' is an Event Item obtained during the [[Spices From the West: Northerly Search]] Event.

It can be created by adding [[Fragrant Seasoning]] to Delicious [[Chicken-Mushroom Skewer]] in the event menu.

==Character Taste-Test Responses==
[[Characters]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]] respond with different voice-overs depending on their personal preferences.
